text: 340 on the Park is a residential tower in the Lakeshore East development of the neighborhood of New Eastside/ East Loop Chicago. It was completed in 2007. The building was surpassed by 55 East Erie as the tallest all-residential building in Chicago. It is currently the second tallest all-residential building in Chicago (One Museum Park being the current tallest) at 672 feet (205 meters) with 62 floors. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official 340 On the Park website *Solomon Cordwell Buenz website Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:2007 establishments in Illinois
title: 340 on the Park
